availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Frankfort, Franklin County, Kentucky carpenter and cabinet maker. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Riddell Whitehead in 1846. Father of William A. Whitehead, Isabella Whitehead, John H. Whitehead, William Whitehead, Robert R. Whitehead, Colin S. Whitehead, and Cristina Whitehead. Carpenter in 1850, 1860 and 1870.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Estill County Marriages, Film #000254628, p. 154.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 41B
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 256
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 104B
Find A Grave, "John Whitehead (1820-1893)," Memorial #60310016, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/60310016 (accessed January 10, 2019).
